column2: "Aber a Josia hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe awɔtwe; na odzii hen mfe eduasa biako wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE n'enyiwa do
column3: na ɔnantseew n'egya David n'akwan do
column4: na ɔanndan ammfa nkyɛn annkɔ enyimfa anaa abankum."

column2: "Na n'ahendzi mu afe a otsia awɔtwe no a ɔda ho yɛ abofra no
column3: nna ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔrohwehwɛ n'egya David ne Nyankopɔn no n'ekyir kwan: na afe a otsia duebien no mu no nna ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ ɔretsew Juda na Jerusalɛm ho efi mbea sorɔnsorɔm
column5: na ehonyi a woesian na ehonyi a woegu no ho."

column2: "Na wodwuruuw Baalim n'afɔrmbukyia no wɔ n'enyim; na ewia ehonyi no a osisi do wɔ sor no
column3: otwitwae gui; na Aserim na ehonyi a woesian
column7: na ɔtowee petsee hɔn a wɔbɔɔ afɔr maa hɔn no hɔn ndakamona no do."

column2: "Na ɔhyeew asɔfo no hɔn mbiew no wɔ hɔn afɔrmbukyia no do
column3: na ɔtseew Juda na Jerusalɛm ho."

column2: "Na dɛmara so na ɔyɛɛ no wɔ Manaasɛ na Efraim na Simeon nkurow do
column3: araa dze kodur Naftali

column2: "Na odwuruuw afɔrmbukyia no
column3: na osiiw Aserim
column4: na ehonyi a woesian no huntuhuntu
column5: na otwitwaa ewia ehonyi no nyinara gui wɔ Israel asaase no nyinara mu

column2: "Afei n'ahendzi no mu afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu
column3: aber a ɔtseew asaase no
column6: na kurow no mu ambrado Maaseia
column7: na Joahaz ɔsɛnkaafo no ne ba Joa
column8: dɛ wɔnkɔ nkesiesie EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn ne fi no."

column2: "Na wɔbaa ɔsɔfopanyin Hilkia nkyɛn
column3: na woyii sika no a wɔdze baa Nyankopɔn fie a Levifo
column5: wɔagyegye no wɔ Manaasɛ na Efraim

column2: "Na wɔdze hyɛɛ edwumayɛfo a wɔyɛ EWURADZE ne fi do ahwɛfo no nsa; na edwumayɛfo a wɔyɛ EWURADZE ne fie edwuma no dze maa dɛ wɔnsesa ofi no mu
column3: na wommiamia mu;"

column2: "mekyerɛ nduadwimfo na adansifo no na wɔdze maa hɔn
column3: dɛ wɔmfa ntotɔ abo a woetwa
column5: na wɔmfa nyɛ mpuna mma adan no a Juda ahemfo asɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na mbarimba no yɛɛ edwuma no nokwar mu: na hɔn ahwɛdofo nye Jahat na Obadia
column3: Levifo a wofi Merarimba mu; na Zekaria na Mesullam a wofi Kohatfo mba mu no
column4: dɛ wompiapia no: na Levifo nkaa no
column5: hɔn a wonyim nsanku ndzɛmba mu nyinara."

column2: "Eso hɔn na wɔhwɛ ndzesoadzefo do
column3: na wopiapia hɔn a wɔyɛ edwuma nyinara wɔ ɔsom ahorow biara mu: na Levifo no mu binom yɛ akyerɛwfo

column2: "Na aber a woriyi sika a wɔdze aba EWURADZE fie no epue no
column3: nna ɔsɔfo Hilkia hun EWURADZE ne mbra nwoma no a wɔdze nam Moses do mae no."

column2: "Na Hilkia buae see ɔkyerɛwfo Safan dɛ
column3: Mehu mbra nwoma no wɔ EWURADZE fie. Na Hilkia dze nwoma no maa Safan."

column2: "Na Safan dze nwoma no kɛmaa ɔhen no
column3: na nkyii so ɔbɔɔ ɔhen no amandzɛɛ dɛ
column4: Dza wɔdze hyɛɛ wo nkowaa nsa no nyinara wɔreyɛ."

column2: "Na woehue sika a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE fie no
column3: na wɔdze ahyɛ ahwɛdofo no na edwumayɛfo no nsa."

column2: "Na afei ɔkyerɛwfo Safan kaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Ɔsɔfo Hilkia dze nwoma bi ama me. Na Safan kenkaan no wɔ ɔhen no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔhen no tsee mbra no ne nsɛm no

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ Hilkia
column3: na Safan ne ba Ahikam
column9: "Hom nkɔ EWURADZE hɔ ebisa mma emi
column10: na hɔn a wɔaka wɔ Israel na Juda mu no
column11: wɔ nwoma no a woehu no no mu nsɛm no ho: na EWURADZE n'ebufuw a woehue egu hɛn do no ɔso
column12: osiandɛ hɛn egyanom enndzi EWURADZE n'asɛm do
column13: annyɛ dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu no tse."

column2: "Nna Hilkia
column3: na hɔn a ɔhen no hyɛɛ hɔn no sii mu kɔr ɔbaa nkɔnhyɛnyi Hulda
column7: ne yer no nkyɛn; (nna ɔtse Jerusalɛm afa a otsia ebien no mu;) na wɔkaa no dɛm kyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn se nye yi: Hom nkɛka nkyerɛ ɔbarimba a ɔsomaa hom wɔ me nkyɛn no dɛ
column7: Hwɛ medze mbusu mebɛba bea yi
column9: mekyerɛ ndom a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma a wɔkenkaan no wɔ Judahen no enyim no mu nyinara:"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔapow me
column3: na wɔakɛhyew eduhuam ama enyame fofor
column4: ama wɔdze hɔn nsaano ndwuma nyinara eeyi me ebufuw; dɛm ntsi m'ebufuhyew bohue egu bea yi do

column2: "Na Judahen a ɔsomaa hom dɛ wombebisa EWURADZE hɔ adze no dze
column3: mbrɛ hom nse no nye yi
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Ɔfa nsɛm a atse no ho dze
column8: na ebrɛɛ woho adze wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim
column9: aber a etsee ne nsɛm a otsia bea yi
column10: na no do mba no ho no
column11: na abrɛ woho adze wɔ m'enyim
column13: na esu wɔ m'enyim ntsi; mo so metsie wo

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: mebɛma akɔ w'egyanom nkyɛn na wɔbɔkora wo akɔ w'adakamona mu asomdwee mu
column4: nkyii so w'enyiwa nnkohu mbusu nyinara a medze reba bea yi
column5: na no do mba no do no. Na wɔbɛkaa asɛm yi kyerɛɛ ɔhen no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no somae na wokehyiaa Juda na Jerusalɛm amampanyin no nyinara ma wɔbaa ne nkyɛn."
"Na ɔhen no
column3: na Juda mbarimba no nyinara na Jerusalɛm mba no nyinara na asɔfo no
column6: akɛse na nkakraba nyina sii mu kɔr EWURADZE fie: na ɔkenkaan ahyɛmu nwoma no a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE fie no no mu nsɛm no nyinara guu hɔn asomu."

column2: "Na ɔhen no gyinaa ne gyinabew
column3: na odzii ahyɛmu wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column6: na ɔnye ne kra nyinara edzi ne mbrasɛm
column8: na n'ahyɛdze a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu no do."

column2: "Na ɔmaa hɔn a wohun hɔn wɔ Jerusalɛm na Benjamin mu nyinara peen do. Na Jerusalɛm mba no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn
column3: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn no

column2: "Na Josia yiyii ekyiwadze no nyinara fii aman a ɔyɛ Israelmba dze no nyinara mu
column3: na ɔmaa hɔn a wohun hɔn wɔ Israel mu no nyinara soom EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn no. Ne nda nyinara mu no woemmfi EWURADZE
